articles.title: Arizona authorities search for ‘Today’ show host Savannah Guthrie’s missing 84-year-old mom
articles.description:
Her family reported her missing around noon Sunday.

The post Arizona authorities search for ‘Today’ show host Savannah Guthrie’s missing 84-year-old mom appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Arizona authorities began searching for Savannah Guthrie's missing mother on Sunday.
The 84-year-old woman was reported missing around noon on February 2.
Boston residents may feel concerned about the safety of elderly family members.

articles.title: Massachusetts keeps losing residents to other states, Census finds
articles.description:
With a net loss of over 30,000 residents leaving for other states, experts warn that the state’s workforce and tax base are at risk.

The post Massachusetts keeps losing residents to other states, Census finds appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts lost over 30,000 residents to other states, impacting local communities.
Experts warn the workforce and tax base are at risk due to this trend.
Continued outmigration may lead to reduced public services for Boston residents.

articles.title: Photos: Day 2 at Something in the Way fest at Roadrunner
articles.description:
Photographer Ben Stas returned for Sunday's installment of the burgeoning indie musical festival in Brighton.

The post Photos: Day 2 at Something in the Way fest at Roadrunner appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Photographer Ben Stas captured Day 2 of the Something in the Way fest in Brighton.
The indie music festival featured multiple artists, attracting local fans on February 2.
Residents enjoyed a vibrant cultural event, enhancing Brighton's community engagement.

articles.title: Punxsutawney Phil is said to have seen his shadow, predicting 6 more weeks of winter weather
articles.description:
The coming week will remain cold, with below-average temperatures in the eastern United States.

The post Punxsutawney Phil is said to have seen his shadow, predicting 6 more weeks of winter weather appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Punxsutawney Phil predicts six more weeks of winter after seeing his shadow.
Boston residents can expect below-average temperatures next week, affecting daily activities.
Cold weather may impact local businesses and heating costs for Boston households.

articles.title: For Bourne, the new Sagamore Bridge takings echo a long past
articles.description:
The state’s move to acquire and demolish 13 homes stirs memories of earlier projects that carved up the town.

The post For Bourne, the new Sagamore Bridge takings echo a long past appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: State plans to acquire and demolish 13 homes for Sagamore Bridge project.
Previous projects in Bourne have historically displaced residents and altered the community.
Local residents express concerns over potential loss of neighborhood identity and community ties.
